parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the protection policy that you want to modify. You can specify only one ID in each request.

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description:
The new name of the protection policy.

> You must specify PolicyName or PolicyStatus.

parameters.name: PolicyStatus
parameters.description:
The new status of the protection policy. Valid values:

*   **on**
*   **off**

> You must specify PolicyName or PolicyStatus.
